summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding the shipment of a hard drive and password for Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) via FedEx. This appears to be part of legal proceedings in the US v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The hard drive and password are being sent to her at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) as part of legal proceedings in US v. Maxwell.

connections.description: M, as an Assistant United States Attorney, is involved in the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell and is arranging for evidence or legal materials to be sent to her.

events.title: Hard Drive Shipment to Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a hard drive and password for Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center via FedEx.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A hard drive and password were sent to Ghislaine Maxwell at the Metropolitan Detention Center on November 20, 2021.
The shipment was arranged by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The document is related to the legal case US v. Maxwell.
The email includes FedEx tracking numbers for both the hard drive and the password.
